name: Elon Colonization Clicker - 10 Hour Challenge
description:
A game made on stream for a 10-hour game dev challenge! How quickly can you reach 1 million people on Mars?

"Elon will stop at nothing to colonize Mars - even if it means clicking, like, an unreasonable number of times."

Check out the stream for more: https://www.twitch.tv/jadenbalogh
